bug.author: vatsal2020
bug.summary: allow_extra parameter in Line 652 in incubator-mxnet/python/mxnet/module/base_module.py needs to be removed to make things work
bug.description: The function that was working perfectly in mxnet 0.11.0 only works in 0.12.0 if allow_extra parameter in Line 652 in incubator-mxnet/python/mxnet/module/base_module.py is removed

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/apache/teams/mxnet-committers>@apache/mxnet-committers</denchmark-link> : This issue has been inactive for the past 90 days. It has no label and needs triage. For general "how-to" questions, our <denchmark-link:https://discuss.mxnet.io/>user forum</denchmark-link> (and <denchmark-link:https://discuss.gluon.ai/>Chinese version</denchmark-link> ) is a good place to get help.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vatsal2020>@vatsal2020</denchmark-link> Its been a long but by any chance do you know if this error occur in recent versions too?
I haven't tried running it on any later versions after mxnet 1.12.0 since I was afraid of running into further errors
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vatsal2020>@vatsal2020</denchmark-link> Can you provide me sample code to reproduce this issue? I didn't encounter it before.
Unfortunately, I don't have access to any code snippets pertaining to this after my intern ended.

Thanks Vatsal for replying. I tried to reproduce the issue with setting parameters creating a module and trying to run the training. I wasn't able to reproduce it. I will be closing this issue for now. Please feel free to open if closed in error. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sandeep-krishnamurthy>@sandeep-krishnamurthy</denchmark-link> Can you please close this issue?
